title: BP Pushes Oil Demand Peak to Mid-2030s
summary: A year ago, BP predicted that oil demand growth could peak before 2030. In that, the company was in tune with the IEA and a host of other forecasters. This year, BP has changed its prediction. Now, the supermajor expects demand growth to continue until the mid-2030s—and then start declining slowly.…

title: Brazil Is Destined to Become One of the World's Top Five Oil Producers
summary: Recently, the International Energy Agency (IEA) identified Brazil as a key non-OPEC oil producer responsible for driving global production growth.
